name: MEC Besnow Jacket - Youths
description:
Grown-up features and quality for those that still have a ways to grow. The Besnow Jacket finds a balance between warmth for winter without too much weight. Loaded with 550-fill certified responsible down this jacket keeps things cozy and packs down small. The streamlined insulated hood adds warmth on fast sled runs and gusty days.Insulated with 550 fill-power duck down that meets the Responsible Down Standard for animal welfare.3-piece hood stays close to the head, keeping warmth in and staying in place when the wind picks up.Smooth elastic piping at the hood edge help seal out chill winds.Fleece lined, zippered pockets warm up cold hands and a large internal mesh pocket is a great place to stash your toque.Storm flap behind the zipper offers an extra bit of protection for the cold.Elasticised hemline and cuffs help keep the jacket in place when on the move or during sled wipe outs.Quilted construction keeps the down in place.Name tag on the inside.

        Sustainability












                      Certified Responsible Down
